Html:
Hi everyone, IÂ´m having trouble using the library to a proxy connection. How can I set the proxy for the library?.

The sample is working right, so I assume it has something to view with this.

Thanks in advance.

Here is how I do it:
    GMapProvider.WebProxy = New System.Net.WebProxy(AppHandler.ProxyAddress, AppHandler.ProxyPort)
    GMapProvider.WebProxy.Credentials = System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultNetworkCredentials
AppHandler.ProxyAddress and AppHandler.ProxyPort are set from a configuration file
